00379   /*
00380   * Used with eval to verify that the result of the $sql question
00381   * and the array in $expecedReturn is equal.
00382   *
00383   * Note: The php code send in to the need funktion should look like
00384   *       this '5' or '"Fareoffice"' or '$var' or 'getValue()'

00386   * Example:
00387   * @code
00388   * eval($this->needEqualSqlResult
00389   * (
00390   *   'SELECT user_id, username FROM user WHERE user_id = 807',

00398   *

00400   *         Php code that should return a two dimensional array,
00401   *         the first array represents the rows in the sql result,
00402   *         and the second array the columns. This array
00403   *         should be equal to the result of the $sql query.
00404   *
00405   * @return - string - Php code that will be used in an eval() expression.

00453   public function _addTestResult($type_, $status_, $code_, $value1_, $value2_)
00454   {
00455     $this->_testCount++;
00456 
00457     // Lägger till i vilken fil och vilken rad som koden kördes.
00458     $backTrace = debug_backtrace();
00459     $this->_testResult[$this->_testCount] = array
00460     (
00461       'file' => str_replace(': eval()\'d code', '', $backTrace[0]['file']),
00462 
00463       'class_name'    => strtolower(get_class($this)),
00464       'section_label' => $this->_currentSectionLabel,
00465       'section_text'  => $this->_currentSectionText,
00466       'fail_comment' => $this->_getFailComment(),
00467 
00468       'type'   => $type_,
00469       'status' => $status_,
00470       'code'   => $code_,
00471 
00472       'return'          => $value1_,
00473       'expected_return' => $value2_
00474     );
00475 
00476     $this->_resetFailComment();
00477   }

00501   public function isEqual($value1_, $value2_)
00502   {
00503     if (is_array($value1__) || is_array($value2__))
00504     {
00505       return $this->_isEqualArray($value1_, $value2_);
00506     }
00507 
00508     //
00509     // Both variables must be of the same type.
00510     //
00511     if (gettype($value1_) == 'double' || gettype($value1_) == 'float')
00512     {
00513       $value1_ = (double)((string)$value1_);
00514     }
00515 
00516     if (gettype($value2_) == 'double' || gettype($value2_) == 'float')
00517     {
00518       $value2_ = (double)((string)$value2_);
00519     }
00520 
00521     if ($value1_ == $value2_)
00522     {
00523       return true;
00524     }
00525     else
00526     {
00527       return false;
00528     }
00529   }
00530 
00543   private function _isEqualArray($value1_, $value2_)
00544   {
00545     if (is_array($value1_) && is_array($value2_))
00546     {
00547       $diffArr = array_diff_assoc_recursive($value1_, $value2_);
00548       if (empty($diffArr))
00549       {
00550         $diffArr = array_diff_assoc_recursive($value2_, $value1_);
00551       }
00552     }
00553     else
00554     {
00555       $diffArr = true;
00556     }
00557 
00558     if (empty($diffArr))
00559     {
00560       return true;
00561     }
00562     else
00563     {
00564       return false;
00565     }
00566   }
